verses.verse: וַיֵּ֖דַע <WH3045> perceived יוֹאָ֣ב <WH3097> Now Joab בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son צְרֻיָ֑ה <WH6870> of Zeruiah כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for לֵ֥ב <WH3820> heart הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> that the king's עַל־ <WH5921> toward אַבְשָׁלֽוֹם׃ <WH53> [was] toward Absalom

וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <WH7971> sent יוֹאָב֙ <WH3097> And Joab תְּק֔וֹעָה <WH8620> to Tekoah וַיִּקַּ֥ח <WH3947> and fetched מִשָּׁ֖ם <WH8033> there אִשָּׁ֣ה <WH802> woman חֲכָמָ֑ה <WH2450> thence a wise וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said אֵ֠לֶיהָ <WH413> about הִֽתְאַבְּלִי־ <WH56> unto her I pray thee feign thyself to be a mourner נָ֞א <WH4994> to her Please וְלִבְשִׁי־ <WH3847> and put on נָ֣א <WH4994> now בִגְדֵי־ <WH899> apparel אֵ֗בֶל <WH60> now mourning וְאַל־ <WH408> not תָּס֙וּכִי֙ <WH5480> and anoint שֶׁ֔מֶן <WH8081> not thyself with oil וְהָיִ֕ית <WH1961> become כְּאִשָּׁ֗ה <WH802> but be as a woman זֶ֚ה <WH2088> he יָמִ֣ים <WH3117> time רַבִּ֔ים <WH7227> that had a long מִתְאַבֶּ֖לֶת <WH56> mourned עַל־ <WH5921> for מֵֽת׃ <WH4191> for the dead

וּבָאת֙ <WH935> And come אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> to the king וְדִבַּ֥רְתְּ <WH1696> and speak אֵלָ֖יו <WH413> about כַּדָּבָ֣ר <WH1697> on this manner הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this וַיָּ֧שֶׂם <WH7760> put יוֹאָ֛ב <WH3097> unto him So Joab אֶת־ <WH853> הַדְּבָרִ֖ים <WH1697> the words בְּפִֽיהָ׃ <WH6310> in her mouth

וַ֠תֹּאמֶר <WH559> spake הָאִשָּׁ֤ה <WH802> And when the woman הַתְּקֹעִית֙ <WH8621> of Tekoah אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> to the king וַתִּפֹּ֧ל <WH5307> she fell עַל־ <WH5921> on אַפֶּ֛יהָ <WH639> on her face אַ֖רְצָה <WH776> to the ground וַתִּשְׁתָּ֑חוּ <WH7812> and did obeisance וַתֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> and said הוֹשִׁ֥עָה <WH3467> Help הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> O king ס

וַיֹּֽאמֶר־ <WH559> said לָ֥הּ הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king מַה־ <WH4100> to her What לָּ֑ךְ וַתֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> unto her What aileth thee? And she answered אֲבָ֛ל <WH61> I [am] indeed אִשָּֽׁה־ <WH802> woman אַלְמָנָ֥ה <WH490> a widow אָ֖נִי <WH589> I וַיָּ֥מָת <WH4191> is dead אִישִֽׁי׃ <WH376> and mine husband

וּלְשִׁפְחָֽתְךָ֙ <WH8198> And thy handmaid שְׁנֵ֣י <WH8147> had two בָנִ֔ים <WH1121> sons וַיִּנָּצ֤וּ <WH5327> strove together שְׁנֵיהֶם֙ <WH8147> and they two בַּשָּׂדֶ֔ה <WH7704> in the field וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> and there מַצִּ֖יל <WH5337> and [there was] none to part בֵּֽינֵיהֶ֑ם <WH996> among וַיַּכּ֧וֹ <WH5221> smote הָאֶחָ֛ד <WH259> them but the one אֶת־ <WH853> הָאֶחָ֖ד <WH259> the other וַיָּ֥מֶת <WH4191> and slew אֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH853>

וְהִנֵּה֩ <WH2009> now behold קָ֨מָה <WH6965> is risen כָֽל־ <WH3605> the whole הַמִּשְׁפָּחָ֜ה <WH4940> And behold the whole family עַל־ <WH5921> against שִׁפְחָתֶ֗ךָ <WH8198> against thine handmaid וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <WH559> and they said תְּנִ֣י ׀ <WH5414> Deliver אֶת־ <WH853> מַכֵּ֣ה <WH5221> him that smote אָחִ֗יו <WH251> his brother וּנְמִתֵ֙הוּ֙ <WH4191> that we may kill בְּנֶ֤פֶשׁ <WH5315> him for the life אָחִיו֙ <WH251> of his brother אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> whom הָרָ֔ג <WH2026> whom he slew וְנַשְׁמִ֖ידָה <WH8045> and we will destroy גַּ֣ם <WH1571> again אֶת־ <WH853> הַיּוֹרֵ֑שׁ <WH3423> the heir וְכִבּ֗וּ <WH3518> also and so they shall quench אֶת־ <WH853> גַּֽחַלְתִּי֙ <WH1513> my coal אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which נִשְׁאָ֔רָה <WH7604> and shall not leave לְבִלְתִּ֧י <WH1115> neither [שֹׂום־ כ] (שִׂים־ <WH7760> to leave לְאִישִׁ֛י <WH7760> which is left ק) שֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> [neither] name וּשְׁאֵרִ֖ית <WH7611> nor remainder עַל־ <WH5921> against פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> upon הָאֲדָמָֽה׃ <WH127> the earth פ

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <WH559> said הַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king אֶל־ <WH413> to הָאִשָּׁ֖ה <WH802> unto the woman לְכִ֣י <WH1980> Go לְבֵיתֵ֑ךְ <WH1004> to thine house וַאֲנִ֖י <WH589> and I אֲצַוֶּ֥ה <WH6680> and I will give charge עָלָֽיִךְ׃ <WH5921> concerning

וַתֹּ֜אמֶר <WH559> said הָאִשָּׁ֤ה <WH802> And the woman הַתְּקוֹעִית֙ <WH8621> of Tekoah אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> unto the king עָלַ֞י <WH5921> and אֲדֹנִ֥י <WH113> My lord הַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <WH4428> O king הֶעָוֹ֖ן <WH5771> the iniquity וְעַל־ <WH5921> and בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> house אָבִ֑י <WH1> [be] on me and on my father's וְהַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> and the king וְכִסְא֖וֹ <WH3678> and his throne נָקִֽי׃ <WH5355> [be] guiltless ס

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> said הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king הַֽמְדַבֵּ֤ר <WH1696> Whosoever saith אֵלַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH413> to you וַֽהֲבֵאת֣וֹ <WH935> [ought] unto thee bring אֵלַ֔י <WH413> about וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יֹסִ֥יף <WH3254> thee any more ע֖וֹד <WH5750> and he will not לָגַ֥עַת <WH5060> him to me and he shall not touch בָּֽךְ׃

וַתֹּאמֶר֩ <WH559> Then said יִזְכָּר־ <WH2142> remember נָ֨א <WH4994> Please הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <WH4428> she I pray thee let the king אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ <WH430> thy God [מֵהַרְבִית כ] (מֵהַרְבַּ֞ת <WH7235> abundance ק) גֹּאֵ֤ל <WH1350> that thou wouldest not suffer the revengers הַדָּם֙ <WH1818> of blood לְשַׁחֵ֔ת <WH7843> to destroy וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> otherwise יַשְׁמִ֖ידוּ <WH8045> lest they destroy אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנִ֑י <WH1121> my son וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> And he said חַי־ <WH2416> liveth יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> [As] the LORD אִם־ <WH518> lo יִפֹּ֛ל <WH5307> fall מִשַּׂעֲרַ֥ת <WH8185> there shall not one hair בְּנֵ֖ךְ <WH1121> of thy son אָֽרְצָה׃ <WH776> to the earth

וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> said הָֽאִשָּׁ֔ה <WH802> Then the woman תְּדַבֶּר־ <WH1696> I pray thee speak נָ֧א <WH4994> Please שִׁפְחָתְךָ֛ <WH8198> Let thine handmaid אֶל־ <WH413> to אֲדֹנִ֥י <WH113> unto my lord הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> the king דָּבָ֑ר <WH1697> [one] word וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> And he said דַּבֵּֽרִי׃ <WH1696> Say on ס

וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> said הָֽאִשָּׁ֔ה <WH802> And the woman וְלָ֧מָּה <WH4100> Why חָשַׁ֛בְתָּה <WH2803> Wherefore then hast thou thought כָּזֹ֖את <WH2063> likewise עַל־ <WH5921> against עַ֣ם <WH5971> such a thing against the people אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> angels וּמִדַּבֵּ֨ר <WH1696> doth speak הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <WH4428> in that the king הַדָּבָ֤ר <WH1697> this thing הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> such כְּאָשֵׁ֔ם <WH818> as one which is faulty לְבִלְתִּ֛י <WH1115> does not הָשִׁ֥יב <WH7725> doth not fetch home again הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> the king אֶֽת־ <WH853> נִדְּחֽוֹ׃ <WH5080> his banished

כִּי־ <WH3588> for מ֣וֹת <WH4191> For we must needs נָמ֔וּת <WH4191> die וְכַמַּ֙יִם֙ <WH4325> and [are] as water הַנִּגָּרִ֣ים <WH5064> spilt אַ֔רְצָה <WH776> on the ground אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which לֹ֣א <WH3808> cannot יֵאָסֵ֑פוּ <WH622> which cannot be gathered up again וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> cannot יִשָּׂ֤א <WH5375> respect אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> neither doth God נֶ֔פֶשׁ <WH5315> [any] person וְחָשַׁב֙ <WH2803> yet doth he devise מַֽחֲשָׁב֔וֹת <WH4284> means לְבִלְתִּ֛י <WH1115> that יִדַּ֥ח <WH5080> that his banished מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <WH4480> at נִדָּֽח׃ <WH5080> be not expelled

וְ֠עַתָּה <WH6258> Now אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> the reason בָּ֜אתִי <WH935> Now therefore that I am come לְדַבֵּ֨ר <WH1696> to speak אֶל־ <WH413> about הַמֶּ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> the king אֲדֹנִי֙ <WH113> unto my lord אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּבָ֣ר <WH1697> of this thing הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this כִּ֥י <WH3588> for יֵֽרְאֻ֖נִי <WH3372> have made me afraid הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> [it is] because the people וַתֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said שִׁפְחָֽתְךָ֙ <WH8198> and thy handmaid אֲדַבְּרָה־ <WH1696> I will now speak נָּ֣א <WH4994> now אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> unto the king אוּלַ֛י <WH194> perhaps יַעֲשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> will perform הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> it may be that the king אֶת־ <WH853> דְּבַ֥ר <WH1697> the request אֲמָתֽוֹ׃ <WH519> of his handmaid

כִּ֚י <WH3588> for יִשְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> will hear הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> For the king לְהַצִּ֥יל <WH5337> to deliver אֶת־ <WH853> אֲמָת֖וֹ <WH519> his handmaid מִכַּ֣ף <WH3709> out of the hand הָאִ֑ישׁ <WH376> of the man לְהַשְׁמִ֨יד <WH8045> [that would] destroy אֹתִ֤י <WH853> וְאֶת־ <WH853> בְּנִי֙ <WH1121> me and my son יַ֔חַד <WH3162> together מִֽנַּחֲלַ֖ת <WH5159> out of the inheritance אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> of God

וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> said שִׁפְחָ֣תְךָ֔ <WH8198> Then thine handmaid יִֽהְיֶה־ <WH1961> become נָּ֛א <WH4994> Please דְּבַר־ <WH1697> The word אֲדֹנִ֥י <WH113> of my lord הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> the king לִמְנוּחָ֑ה <WH4496> shall now be comfortable כִּ֣י ׀ <WH3588> for כְּמַלְאַ֣ךְ <WH4397> for as an angel הָאֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> of God כֵּ֣ן <WH3651> so אֲדֹנִ֤י <WH113> so [is] my lord הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> the king לִשְׁמֹ֙עַ֙ <WH8085> to discern הַטּ֣וֹב <WH2896> good וְהָרָ֔ע <WH7451> and bad וַֽיהוָ֥ה <WH3068> therefore the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> thy God יְהִ֥י <WH1961> become עִמָּֽךְ׃ <WH5973> with פ

וַיַּ֣עַן <WH6030> answered הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <WH4428> Then the king וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> and said אֶל־ <WH413> to הָ֣אִשָּׁ֔ה <WH802> unto the woman אַל־ <WH408> nay נָ֨א <WH4994> Please תְכַחֲדִ֤י <WH3582> Hide מִמֶּ֙נִּי֙ <WH4480> at דָּבָ֔ר <WH1697> not from me I pray thee the thing אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after אָנֹכִ֖י <WH595> am about שֹׁאֵ֣ל <WH7592> that I shall ask אֹתָ֑ךְ <WH853> וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> said הָֽאִשָּׁ֔ה <WH802> thee And the woman יְדַבֶּר־ <WH1696> now speak נָ֖א <WH4994> please אֲדֹנִ֥י <WH113> Let my lord הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> the king

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king הֲיַ֥ד <WH3027> [Is not] the hand יוֹאָ֛ב <WH3097> of Joab אִתָּ֖ךְ <WH854> in בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all זֹ֑את <WH2063> likewise וַתַּ֣עַן <WH6030> answered הָאִשָּׁ֣ה <WH802> with thee in all this? And the woman וַתֹּ֡אמֶר <WH559> and said חֵֽי־ <WH2416> liveth נַפְשְׁךָ֩ <WH5315> [As] thy soul אֲדֹנִ֨י <WH113> my lord הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <WH4428> the king אִם־ <WH518> no אִ֣שׁ ׀ <WH786> can לְהֵמִ֣ין <WH3231> turn to the right hand וּלְהַשְׂמִ֗יל <WH8041> or to the left מִכֹּ֤ל <WH3605> anything אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after דִּבֶּר֙ <WH1696> hath spoken אֲדֹנִ֣י <WH113> from ought that my lord הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> the king כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Indeed עַבְדְּךָ֤ <WH5650> for thy servant יוֹאָב֙ <WH3097> Joab ה֣וּא <WH1931> who צִוָּ֔נִי <WH6680> he bade וְה֗וּא <WH1931> who שָׂ֚ם <WH7760> me and he put בְּפִ֣י <WH6310> in the mouth שִׁפְחָֽתְךָ֔ <WH8198> of thine handmaid אֵ֥ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַדְּבָרִ֖ים <WH1697> all these words הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> these

לְבַעֲב֤וּר <WH5668> To סַבֵּב֙ <WH5437> fetch about אֶת־ <WH853> פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> this form הַדָּבָ֔ר <WH1697> of speech עָשָׂ֛ה <WH6213> done עַבְדְּךָ֥ <WH5650> hath thy servant יוֹאָ֖ב <WH3097> Joab אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּבָ֣ר <WH1697> this thing הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this וַאדֹנִ֣י <WH113> and my lord חָכָ֗ם <WH2450> [is] wise כְּחָכְמַת֙ <WH2451> according to the wisdom מַלְאַ֣ךְ <WH4397> of an angel הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> of God לָדַ֖עַת <WH3045> to know אֶֽת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> is in בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> all [things] that [are] in the earth ס
